itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple Windows VM in a region of your choosing
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Windows VM using a few different options for the Windows version, using the latest patched version. This will deploy in West US on a D1 VM Size.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Visual Studio Community 2013 Update 5 with Azure 2.8 on Windows Server 2012 R2
